{"id":1041809256,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1693975380,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"15 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1041809256/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Delete Operation for Two Strings","memory":"12.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        int longest = longestCommonSubsequence(word1, word2);\n        return (word1.size() - longest + word2.size() - longest);\n    }\nprivate:\n    int longestCommonSubsequence(string& text1, string& text2) {\n        int n=text1.size(), m=text2.size();\n        vector <vector<int>> dp(n + 1,vector<int>(m + 1, 0));\n\n        for(int i=1; i<=n; i++){\n            for(int j=1; j<=m; j++){\n                if(text1[i-1]==text2[j-1]){\n                    dp[i][j] = 1 + dp[i-1][j-1];\n                }\n                else{\n                    dp[i][j] = max(dp[i-1][j],dp[i][j-1]);\n                }        \n            }\n        }\n\n        return dp[n][m];\n    }\n\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"delete-operation-for-two-strings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
